name: Lisa
title: "Witch of Purple Rose" Lisa
desc: Pursuing the arcane mysteries of magic, and waiting quietly for an encounter with truth.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Lisa to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Lightning Touch
skills.desc: Deals 1 <span style="color:#FFACFFFF">Electro DMG:If this Skill is a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Charged Attack: Attach <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Conductive to the opponent's active character.

skills.name: Violet Arc
skills.desc: Deals 2 <span style="color:#FFACFFFF">Electro DMG. If <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Conductive is not attached to the opponent's active character, <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Conductive will be attached.

skills.name: Lightning Rose
skills.desc: Deals 2 <span style="color:#FFACFFFF">Electro DMG, summons <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Lightning Rose.
